title: Multisensory VR Science Inquiry: Sensory-Based Micro-Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific principles and proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Development of VR/multisensory learning strategies for practicing elementary teachers to utilize as science education specialists within corporate settings

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce a science experiment simulation combining visual, auditory, and olfactory stimuli in a VR environment with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply creative scientific problem-solving strategies using multisensory stimulation in three or more projects.
Learners pass quiz assessments linked to VR content with a completion rate of over 90% in mobile-based microlearning modules.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
